features: 【Immersive Hi-Fi Stereo Bass】 Built-in a 40mm audio driver to ensure rich bass and crisp midrange which provides the best sound reproduction for all your needs, while ideal sound isolation effect to eliminate annoying background noise.

【Lightweight and Folding】 Padded ultra-soft ear cushions and headband provide a perfect custom fit for all users and a comfortable and Long-lasting listening experience while protecting the ears. Adjustable size slider and foldable design make it Space-Saving and easy to carry.

【Durable and Tangle-free】 The rugged resilient plastic shell and no tangle 4.9 ft (1.5m) nylon woven rope ensure durability. Wired headphones are suitable for kids, children, adults, and are designed for school, online learning, training, home, office, Airport, Plane, Travel, and more.

【Friendly Microphone Button】 Easy to answer or end calls, Play/Pause audio, and skip tracks forward and backward via in-line control. Wired headphones offer universal compatibility with all 3.5mm jack devices, such as smartphones, laptops, desktops, Kindle, computers, PCs, MP3, MP4, etc.
【What You Get】 Elecder i45 headphones wired, user guide, our worry-free 24-month warranty, easy to contact and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Frequently Questions & Answers Q: Is it suitable for adults or children? A: The wired headphones have adjustable headband for different head circumferences. So both children and adults can wear them. And more, we recommend that kids over 8 years old wear headphones. Q: Can I use these with my fire tablet 10 or iPad mini? A: Yes, but for iPhone 7, iPad Pro 11 and above need A lightning to 3.5mm jack adapter (Not included) Q: Do the headphones have a volume control function? A: Wired headphones do not have volume control buttons, you can adjust the volume from your device, such as a smartphone, computer, laptops, PCs, Kindle, MP3/4, tablets, etc. Q: Where is the headset's built-in microphone? A: The mic is located on the nylon cable and is on the back of the function button. Q: What is the measurement of the folding product? Is it suitable for travel? A: The headphones are easy to carry and can be used for travel, airplanes, etc. Folded approximate size is 6*4.53*2.87 inches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was shocked at the sound these things have! Ordered for my mother and she loves them! Very cheap for such great quality. Nice and comfortable fit. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight. Great sound.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my son last minute since he was going in a camping trip and his other headphones just broke. The showed they would be delivered that same day and were a good price. My son uses them for his laptop to record music and said he loved how lightweight they were and they folded up to fit in his backpack. He also said how surprised he was by the quality of the sound and now wants me to buy a couple more pairs for backup, so I guess we found a winner. :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality & good price
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable and quality for a good price! Everything works well. Good for my son when he plays online games. Mic works just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Headphone for children!
reviews.reviewText: If you are on the hunt for a reliable and stylish headphone for your kids, look no further. I recently purchased this for my child and I’m extremely happy with the product.Firstly, the design and colors are great! The cool colors and funky patterns immediately caught my child’s attention and they were thrilled to wear it. The headphones are also lightweight and comfortable, ensuring that my child can wear them for extended periods without any discomfort.The sound quality is good enough, providing clear and crisp audio. The built-in microphone is a fantastic addition, allowing my child to make calls or participate in online classes with ease. The wired connection provides a stable and reliable connection, ensuring uninterrupted audio playback.Overall, these headphones are an excellent choice for kids. With its appealing design, comfortable fit, decent sound quality, and above all price, it ticks all the boxes for a perfect headphone for children. I highly recommend it to any parent in search of a reliable and kid-friendly headphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable Delight: On-Ear Headphones for School
reviews.reviewText: These on-ear headphones have proven to be a great investment. The durability of these headphones is impressive, withstanding the daily wear and tear of going back and forth to school.Functionality-wise, they deliver crisp sound quality, providing an immersive experience for educational content or entertainment during commutes. The on-ear design strikes a good balance, offering audio clarity without completely blocking out the surrounding environment—important for safety during school travel.If you're in search of reliable on-ear headphones for your child's school adventures, these have certainly earned my recommendation. They hold up exceptionally well, providing both durability and a delightful audio experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far I really like. Snug fit. Very comfortable. Good sound. Last time I ordered a different brand. Used very gently and the only lasted 8 mo. Hoping these last a longer time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great head phone
reviews.reviewText: The head phones works great ... great price for the value. And very flashy .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Firm-tight head to ear fit, especially over glasses.
reviews.reviewText: Returned as too tight to wear comfortably with glasses on a wide head.
